full_summary:
### Solicitation for Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Solicitation Information

* ID: WS4348488867-DOC4350830381
* Publication Date: 2023-12-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-10 (14:00:00 Local Ottawa Time)
* Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement (CFTA compliant)

### Description

This procurement is for the acquisition of aircraft digital altitude control systems (Aircraft Category: *25201601 - UNSPSC Code) in accordance with repair of Service Bulletin (SB) 650-31-005. The goods being sought after are as follows:

* PN: 650K31-005 KIT

### Invitation to Participate

This RFP is open only to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders, specifically those holding the SA contract T8493-140035. The following suppliers are invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLCAero Supplies IncNon-Destructive Testing Products LtdMaxcraft Avionics Ltd.Pole Air AviationSimex Defence IncStandard AeroTower AerospaceTulmar SafetyUnisource Technology IncVector Aerospace AtlanticZepoli International IncPHP Canada3 Points AviationBSF International IncAvmax AviationJHT DefenseKadex Aero SupplyNewcastle Aviation Partners LLCSoutheast AerospaceCanada West AvionicsCanRep Inc.Voyageur Avparts Inc.Genaire LTDKitchener Aero (dba Mid-Canada Mod Center)PAL AerospaceTronosjet MaintenanceAero Technical ComponentsArnprior AerospacePratt & Whitney CanadaALLCLEAR AEROSPACE & DEFENSE, INC.Bristow Instruments (1977) LtdCASP Aerospace Inc

### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Key Contracting Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Country of Procurement: Canada
* Province of Procurement: Ontario
* City of Procurement: Ottawa
* Address of Department, Postal Code K1A0N8 

### Contact Details

Edmond Egikian (SPAC/PSPC)
edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
